enhanced_description: Razorpay is India’s first full-stack financial solutions company, distinguished as India’s only enterprise payroll software with automated compliance. It streamlines enterprise payroll processing, offering 100% automated tax filing and payment for complex Indian regulations including TDS, PF, PT, and ESIC across all 30 states, ensuring zero filing errors and penalties. The platform provides strategic payroll analytics and features a unified integrations platform, effortlessly syncing data with over 45 HR platforms like Darwinbox and Oracle HCM. Designed for large enterprises, Razorpay offers enterprise-grade systems with on-demand customization for salaries, departments, and reports, aiming to enhance the payment experience for over 300 million end consumers and improve employee happiness and engagement for Indian businesses.
